description: Retrieves the scanning configuration for a registry.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: scanningConfiguration
nested_items.description: The scanning configuration for the registry.

nested_items.name: scanType
nested_items.description: The type of scanning configured for the registry.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: The scanning rules associated with the registry.

nested_items.name: scanFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency that scans are performed at for a private registry. When the ENHANCED scan type is specified, the supported scan frequencies are CONTINUOUS_SCAN and SCAN_ON_PUSH. When the BASIC scan type is specified, the SCAN_ON_PUSH scan frequency is supported. If scan on push is not specified, then the MANUAL scan frequency is set by default.

nested_items.name: repositoryFilters
nested_items.description: The repository filters associated with the scanning configuration for a private registry.

nested_items.name: filter
nested_items.description: The filter to use when scanning.

nested_items.name: filterType
nested_items.description: The type associated with the filter.
